column1: #Text=Tong says : " From now on , we 'll celebrate a new Avatar Day in honor of the day Avatar Aang saved us from the Rough Rhino Invasion . "
#Text=Tong says : " That 's our new festival food !
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is by far the worst town we 've ever been to .

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Iroh Katara Momo Sokka Tong Zuko Antagonists Chin ( flashback only ) Rough Rhinos Kahchi Mongke Ogodei Vachir Yeh - Lu says : " Minor Foaming mouth guy Koko Kyoshi Oyaji Scary prisoner Sensitive ruffian " Sokka says : " This is it !
#Text=The official rendezvous point for the invasion force .
#Text=" Toph says : " How did you pick this place ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Before we split up , my dad and I found this island on the map .
#Text=It 's uninhabited , and the harbors surrounded by the cliffs seemed like the perfect secluded place .
#Text=And we 're here four days ahead of schedule .
#Text=Let 's just calm down and - " Katara says : " Sokka 's got the right idea , Aang .
#Text=The best thing we can do now is get plenty of rest .
